messages.body: $FB $AAPL $GOOGL $NFLX $AMZN $T $XOM $CMCSA As if lobbying isn‚Äôt enough, now they even openly takes political sides https://www.yahoo.com/finance/news/google-search-showed-nazism-california-212200577.html

links.title: Google search showed 'Nazism' as a California Republican Party ideology
links.description: As California gears up for its primary, many of the state's Republicans are fuming over how Google described their party in its search results. Those searching for "California Republicans" or "California Republican Party" would have found a result that listed "Nazism" as one of the party's ideologies along with "Conservatism," "Market liberalism," "Fiscal conservatism" and "Green conservatism."
